column46: A Symphony of Natural Ingredients for Pore PerfectionMoringa Purifying Pore Pads harness the power of nature's finest ingredients to deliver a comprehensive pore care solution. Let's delve into the magic behind each component:â€¢ Moringa Seed Extract: This powerhouse ingredient, present in a generous 388,000ppm, is a patented sebum control agent and an anti-pollution warrior. It effectively clears impurities and deeply cleanses pores, leaving the skin smooth and refreshed. Its wealth of amino acids and vitamins further boosts skin elasticity and hydration.â€¢ 7-Herbal Complex: A synergistic blend of fermented soybean, willow, cypress, and cinnamon extracts works wonders on the skin. This potent complex soothes irritations, provides lasting moisture, and regulates sebum production for a balanced complexion.â€¢ PHA & LHA: These gentle exfoliators gently remove dead skin cells, revealing a smoother, brighter, and more refined texture.â€¢ Hydration Heroes: Infused with 10 different moisturizing ingredients, including various hyaluronic acids, polyglutamic acid, ectoin, and panthenol, these pads deliver deep hydration that lasts. Your skin will feel plump, supple, and radiant.â€¢ Cooling Relief: Experience an instant cooling sensation with ingredients that instantly reduce skin temperature by 13.55%. This soothing effect is perfect for calming irritated skin and minimizing redness.â€¢ Eco-Conscious Choices: We believe in caring for both your skin and the planet. Moringa Pore Pads are certified vegan, OEKO-TEX, and biodegradable, ensuring you can enjoy their benefits with a clean conscience.This carefully curated blend of ingredients works in harmony to deliver exceptional pore care, leaving you with a clear, radiant, and healthy complexion.

How to Use For cleansing, apply an appropriate amount to your entire face and gently massage around when bubbles are generated. Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water (Applicable either to wet or dry face)

How to use tip

01. 20-second cleansing in the morning! Apply an appropriate amount evenly to your face. In 20 seconds later when bubbles are generated, gently rinse.

02. 60-second cleansing in the evening! Apply an appropriate amount evenly to your face. In 60 seconds later when bubbles are generated enough, massage around and then rinse gently.

03. 5-minute deep cleansing pack! Before taking a shower, apply a thick layer of the formula to your face and let it rest for five minutes to have enough bubbles. Massage around and rinse gently.

How to use tip for man! Apply a thick layer of the formula on areas to shave instead of your shaving foam.

Please replace the cap with the included pumping nozzle for use.

Due to the nature of the formula, bubbles can be formed when exposed to air or in the pump during use as the formula meets oxygen in the air. It is only natural that you can use it with confidence.
